thread.section_title: Endoca Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Endoca | www.endoca.com | 2 of 30
thread.title: D.D

author: D.D
title: D.D
text:
Ordered my mum the cba + cbda 3% oil for her arthritis and she says it definetly took the edge off her pain, she struggles to walk far and do a lot off stuff when her pain is at its worse, but after tryin this oil she says it lets her get out more and go shoppin and stuff. So we are really pleased.
Also quick delivery and the customer service and help from the chat option was great. Thanks for your help endoca. I highly reccomend them. Going to try the chewing gum and lip balm along with the oil again on next order.
